snippet: The latest Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews conducted Nov. 6 through 10 with 1,495 adults throughout the United States. Of those, 1,259 said they were registered to vote.
lead_paragraph: The latest Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews conducted Nov. 6 through 10 with 1,495 adults throughout the United States. Of those, 1,259 said they were registered to vote.

headline.main: How the New York Times/CBS News Poll Was Conducted
